pr_title: DHFPROD-5691: Fix outstanding issue found by coverity static scan

timeline.bodyText: Can you include a brief comment to explain why this map has a concrete type but the others are just Map? Otherwise some well-meaning developer in the future will change this to Map to be consistent with the others.
timeline.author: rjrudin
